title: Indie Fonts - Volume ONE
content:
I’d like to get a copy of Volume One of “Indie Fonts”, but I don’t want to pay money. Anybody interested in bartering his/her copy (new or lightly used) please contact me (via this thread, or my Typophile profile, or the Typophile IM, or carrier pigeon). I have a lot of stuff, and can get almost anything (photocopied, photographed or scanned) from UCLA. So, what’s your pleasure? Typographic requests only please. ;-)

hhp
author: hrant
